RTCRtpSenderSetParameters.summary: The setParameters() method of the interface applies changes the configuration of sender's , which is the for which the RTCRtpSender is responsible.

remarks.para: In other words, setParameters() updates the configuration of the RTP transmission as well as the encoding configuration for a specific outgoing media track on the WebRTC connection.

-WebRTC API
-Codecs used by WebRTC
-Web media technologies

RTCRtpSenderSetParameters.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves when the property is updated with the given parameters.
